critique: The document is a formal executive order amending regulations for payment of losses sustained by US employees in foreign countries due to currency appreciation. It is primarily concerned with defining terms, outlining methods of computation, and specifying effective dates. Given the formal and technical nature of the document, the emotional intensity is expected to be low across all emotions. There is no indication of joy, sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise. Therefore, the initial scores will be set to 1 for all emotions.
